channel.title: GaoQiangQiang's personal website
channel.description: Recent content on GaoQiangQiang's personal website

item.title: Notes
item.description: 创建hugo个人网站 1.git clone https://riding-in-world-of-mortals/inn.git 2.cd inn 3.hugo new site hugo 4.cd hugo 5.搜索hugo,进入网站，选择博客主题 6.在gitee已登入页面的“我的”的页面的最右端的“+”中选择“从github/gitlab导入仓库”，将选择的hugo主题素材导入进来 7.git clone https://gitee.com/riding-in-the-world-of-mortals/hugo-theme-air.git 8.echo theme = "air" » config.toml 9.hugo new posts/my-first-post.md 10.hugo new posts/notes.md 11.hugo server -D 12.hugo -D 13.hugo server –theme=air –buildDrafts 14.http://localhost:1313 15.假设你需要部署在 GitHub Pages 上，首先在GitHub上创建一个Repository，命名为：yourusername.github.io （yourusername替换为你的github用户名）。在站点根目录执行 Hugo 命令生成最终页面： 16.hugo –theme=hyde –baseUrl=“http://yourusername.github.io/" 17.如果一切顺利，所有静态页面都会生成到 public 目录，将pubilc目录里所有文件 push 到刚创建的Repository的 master 分支。 18.cd public 19.git init 20.git remote add origin https://github.com/yourusername/yourusername.github.io.git 21.git add -A 22.git commit -m “first commit” 23.

item.title: sample
item.description: Hugo is the world’s fastest static website engine. It’s written in Go (aka Golang) and developed by bep, spf13 and friends. Below you will find some of the most common and helpful pages from our documentation. https://gohugo.io/documentation/
